alert.note: Alert for Laurens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 5:16PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Laurens County through 545 PM EST... At 516 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Laurens, or 4 miles northeast of Waterloo, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laurens, Clinton, Joanna, Cross Hill, Waterloo, Mountville and Kinards. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EST for Upstate South Carolina.
